  • Reference

    Function reference

    General Functions

    Functions to retrieve general information from MFL

    average_draft()
    Average Draft information
    injuries()
    Injury information
    mfl_app
    Generic endpoint object
    mfl_endpoint
    MFL Endpoint
    player_profile()
    Player Profile
    player_ranks()
    Player Ranks
    players()
    Player list
    rule_dictionary()
    Rule Dictionary
    season_state
    Season Information
    set_season()
    Define the season

    League Specific functions

    Function to retrieve league specific information. Requires setting a league ID

    conferences()
    League Conferences
    divisions()
    League Divisions
    franchises()
    League Franchises
    free_agents()
    Free agents for active league
    league_app
    Basic league object that is generated at package startup
    league_rosters()
    Rosters for current league
    league_schedule()
    Schedule for active league
    league_standings()
    Retrieve league standings
    player_scores()
    Player scores for active league
    projected_scores()
    Projected Scores for active league
    points_allowed()
    Fantasy points allowed
    scoring_rule
    Base R6 Class for scoring rules
    set_league()
    Identify league
    starters()
    Lineup requirements for active league
    weekly_results()
    Weekly Results for active league

    User functions

    Functions related to specific user

    mfl_login()
    Login to MFL
    my_leagues()
    List users leagues

    NFL specific information

    NFL related information

    bye_weeks()
    Get bye weeks
    injuries()
    Injury information
    nfl_schedule()
    Get NFL Schedule
